original_title: 何もかも百回も言われたこと
overview: "Everyone around me is kind, but the world isn't going well...". Yumi Aotani, a ronin student who attends an art prep school, felt that way. She will start summer classes again this year. Aside from the days when she can't realize the future, the melancholy and happy summer slowly passes by...
title: 何もかも百回も言われたこと
